name: Blonde Ale
description: Brewed with locally sourced Midwestern honey, our Blonde ale is clean and balanced, with subtle fruity notes in the fermentation profile and a dry finish.

name: Boat Shoes
description: With a moderate amount of bitterness and a crisp, dry finish, this light, malt-forward Kölsch-style ale is made for leisure. It might be what a fool believes, but we think that peaceful, easy felling is more of a mindset than anything a rich girl can buy.

name: Cashmere Pils
description: Dry-hopped with Cashmere hops, this easy-drinking Pils features delicate aromas of lemon and lime peel, with citrus and cracker balancing the flavors ahead of a dry, bitter finish.

name: Crash Landed
description: Our first ever recipe, this not-so-subtle wheat IPA has an assertive hop bitterness with citrus and floral notes, backed by a slightly sweet malt profile.

name: Dicey Riley
description: Brewed with Maris Otter malt, this malty red ale has a slightly sweet, biscuity flavor with a mildly bitter finish and aromas of caramel and raisin.

name: Ducks Fly Together
description: Medium bitter, with orange rind and lemon zest notes, this easy-drinking dry-hopped American lager ends with a biscuity/malty finish. Wherever your Flying V takes you and your crew, it’s a great beer for sharing with friends and the perfect reminder that Ducks Fly Together.

name: Free Bird
description: A sessionable pale ale with a clean malt character and citrusy hop notes. This beer takes its name from the Falconer's Flight hops we use to brew it.

name: Hophazardly
description: Brewed with an adventurous amount of Simcoe and Citra hops, this IPA has a piney, citrusy aroma, and features citrusy grapefruit notes balanced by malty flavors that allow a dry, mellow finish. Throw caution to the wind with us and enjoy!

name: Let It Go
description: Let it Go features rye malt, and Simcoe and Amarillo hops, to produce a dank and slightly spicy version of the American Pale Ale.

name: Neighborly Stout Nitro
description: Aromas of roast and chocolate, backed by a very dry finish. Nitro elevates the mouthfeel, creating a soft, creamy body that perfectly compliments its taste.

name: No Tomorrow
description: In the spirit of living for today, we double dry-hopped this hazy IPA with copious amounts of Citra & Simcoe hops. It features notes of juicy citrus fruit, orange zest, candied peach, and a touch of dank pine. Just watch out for that first step — it’s a doozy!

name: Rye Barrel Aged Imperial Pajamas - Sagamore Rye
description: We aged this variation of barrel-aged Imperial Pajamas for six months in Sagamore Spirit Straight Rye Whiskey barrels. The rich, oaky result is comfort beer at its finest. Tasting notes of cacao, caramel cherry wood, and rye.

name: When Cranberries Fly
description:
We'll be the first ones to admit that we never thought we'd make a sour. "When pigs fly," we thought - and for no good reason, really, just because. But we hadn't considered all the other things that could fly...like cranberries.

Cranberry puree complements the tartness of the base beer and contributes a slightly tannic finish. It also gives this sour ale a light-pink appearance, so it's smart, complex and pretty.

name: The Northman Rosé
description: Aromas of dark cherry and rich plum are rounded with a lush body and layers of red fruit. Our rosé cider proves that dry can be beautiful too.
